name: SnapshotBlendingModes

properties.name: IGNORE_LAYOUT_SNAPSHOTS
properties.description: Turns off the influence of layout snapshots completely.

properties.name: USE_NEAREST_SNAPSHOT
properties.description: Use the layout snapshot nearest in size and shape to the new layout.

properties.name: LIMITED_SNAPSHOT_BLENDING
properties.description: Use only layout snapshots within the same class as the new layout.

properties.name: FULL_SNAPSHOT_BLENDING
properties.description: Use up to three nearest snapshots even if a snapshot is in a different class that the new layout.

description: Modes that control which nearby snapshots, by size and shape, are blended into the new layout.
